Sentencas: Nickel (Ni)-yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) cermets are a prevalent material used for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anode behavior upon redox cycling based on electrical characterization

Sentencas: The cermet degrades upon redox cycling.
Titulo: Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anode behavior upon redox cycling based on electrical characterization

Sentencas: The degradation is related to microstructural changes, but knowledge of the mechanisms has been limited.
Titulo: Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anode behavior upon redox cycling based on electrical characterization

Sentencas: Direct current conductivity measurements were performed on cermets and cermets where the Ni component was removed.
Titulo: Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anode behavior upon redox cycling based on electrical characterization

Sentencas: Measurements were carried out before, during, and after redox cycling the cermet.
Titulo: Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anode behavior upon redox cycling based on electrical characterization

Sentencas: The cermet conductivity degraded over time due to sintering of the nickel phase.
Titulo: Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anode behavior upon redox cycling based on electrical characterization

Sentencas: Following oxidizing events, the conductivity of the cermets improved, whereas the conductivity of the YSZ phase decreased.
Titulo: Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anode behavior upon redox cycling based on electrical characterization

Sentencas: An improved model of the redox degradation mechanism was established based on the measurements.
Titulo: Ni-YSZ solid oxide fuel cell anode behavior upon redox cycling based on electrical characterization
